events.name: Rest Day
events.description:
Rest day, no workout.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x30s sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Tempo/SS Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description: Low cadence tempo work, 3x10min at 90% FTP.

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
4h Z2 ride, focus on endurance, hydrate and fuel regularly.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Threshold/SS/Tempo (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
90 min ride focusing on threshold efforts, maintain high cadence.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)
